column4: Hey can someone help me to get my laptop with 10.10 to connect to my wifi
How do I find that out? New to ubuntu and internal components
usb or pci? lsusb for the first lspci the second  --> paste.ubuntu.com
and please paste the output of ifconfig as well
How do I find out thechipset. Can I have specific instructions
usb or pci? lsusb for the first lspci the second  --> paste.ubuntu.com
Its a laptop its built in to the motherboard
so run those commands in the terminal and paste.ubuntu.com with them
I don't have any Internet access on my laptop.only my iPhone which is how I talking now
then copy it down and pastebin it
look for wireless controller like atheros broadcom or the like
what does ifconfig show; eth0 lo and wlan0
Eth0 and l0 but no wlan0. It says at top device not ready
so check the wifi docs linked to you
